title: CONTAINERYARD / EVRART GUN
description:
"Let's talk about my lost gun."
&
"Can I have my lost gun now?"

dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: ""Yes, yes, my best men are tracking..."
dialogueTree.text: "Yes, yes, my best men are tracking it down. Some kids saw some other kids running away with it. Some folks said a paranoid schizophrenic might have it. Leads are being checked, Harry."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""What's that, Harry? You're getting..."
links.text: "What's that, Harry? You're getting a little pale. Is it the words *paranoid schizophrenic* and *lost gun* in one sentence? Don't worry, it's just a lead. It'll probably turn out to be nothing."

dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: ""Yes. Your lost gun." His face turn..."
dialogueTree.text: "Yes. Your lost gun." His face turns serious. "My best men are on it. They're turning every stone, searching every playground, asking kids, grandmas, everyone."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Your gun *will* be found, Harry. L..."
links.text: "Your gun *will* be found, Harry. Let me assure you of that." He winks at you. "It's just a matter of time and... *effort*."

links.title: Rhetoric: "The only way to find it seems to be..."
links.text: The only way to find it seems to be working with him. He might even be holding your gun hostage...

links.title: You: "Hold on, could he really hold my gu..."
links.text: Hold on, could he really hold my gun hostage?

links.title: Rhetoric: "Who knows? Only one thing is certai..."
links.text: Who knows? Only one thing is certain: If you work with him, you're going to get it back, and working with him might be the only way to do it.

links.title: You: ""Wait... the gun may have been boug..."
links.text: "Wait... the gun may have been bought from Roy's pawn shop. Have your men factored that in?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Yes, thank you for the *hot tip* r..."
links.text: "Yes, thank you for the *hot tip* regarding your lost gun, Harry. My men have indeed" -- he makes air quotes -- "*factored in that you pawned it*."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Now please... let the professional..."
links.text: "Now please... let the professionals do their job. Kick back, Harry, relax! I have *great guys* on this. You focus on what's important â€“ building our relationship for the good of Martinaise."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "It did not come as a surprise to hi..."
links.text: It did not come as a surprise to him. He might actually not be bullshitting.

links.title: Inland Empire: "It did not come as a surprise to hi..."
links.text: It did not come as a surprise to him. He might actually not be bullshitting.

links.title: You: ""I will not be blackmailed with thi..."
links.text: "I will not be blackmailed with this gun business."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Harry, Harry -- I was only trying..."
links.text: "Harry, Harry -- I was only trying to be tactful. A lost gun is a dangerous thing. I can't have it around in my neighbourhood."

links.title: Evrart Claire: "His tone is suddenly very serious...."
links.text: His tone is suddenly very serious. "Kids could be playing gun-roulette with it as we speak. Teenage gangs could be arming themselves. Get a hold of yourself, Harry!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I assure you, we are working on lo..."
links.text: "I assure you, we are working on locating the missing sidearm as well."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "The lieutenant is concerned about t..."
links.text: The lieutenant is concerned about the lost gun and feels that the fact you haven't prioritized looking for it is unfortunate, if inevitable, and doesn't put the RCM in a good light.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Excellent, Mr. Kitsuragi. That's e..."
links.text: "Excellent, Mr. Kitsuragi. That's excellent news." He claps his hands together. "Looks like we have a friendly gun-finding competition on our hands."

links.title: You: ""I don't care about my gun. Keep it.""
links.text: "I don't care about my gun. Keep it."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""'I don't care about my gun'..." he..."
links.text: "'I don't care about my gun'..." he repeats. "I love it, Harry! Wish I could be like that. But I can't. I have a responsibility to this community. I can't have a loaded gun out in the streets."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The officer is exaggerating," says..."
links.text: "The officer is exaggerating," says the lieutenant, leaning forward. "Of course we care about the missing firearm, and we are *actively* looking for it as well."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""'I don't care about my gun...'" he..."
links.text: "'I don't care about my gun...'" he repeats. "I love it, Harry! Wish I could be like that. But I can't. I have a responsibility to this community. I can't have a loaded gun in the streets."

links.title: You: ""Does this mean if I do things for..."
links.text: "Does this mean if I do things for you I will get my gun back?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Damn it, Harry, that's exactly wha..."
links.text: "Damn it, Harry, that's exactly what it means!"

links.title: Half Light: "He is not."
links.text: He is not.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course," the lieutenant replies..."
links.text: "Of course," the lieutenant replies dryly. "I understand. We help you -- you help us."
